A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The whole movie is just a mess of plot holes and flat characters. Some review describe it as a 'sprawling adventure' but the only way it sprawls is that it's all over the place with no real story. Or at least\, no story that makes sense. The characters exclusively make terrible decisions\, and the plot is nonsensical. Worst star wars movie ever\, so bad in fact that many people I've spoken to refuse to accept it as canon\, no matter what Disney say. The only reason I have not rated 'macguffin wars: the Mary sue awakens' less\, is because rotten tomatoes doesn't count scores of less than 1 star.
